page.name: Glittering Gelid Staff
page.description: This staff is so cold that when you place it near slithy toves, they grow too cold to gyre and gimble.  That's how you know it's really, really cold.  This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Glittering Gelid Staff
properties.description: This staff is so cold that when you place it near slithy toves, they grow too cold to gyre and gimble.  That's how you know it's really, really cold.  This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Don't have a Kow
page.description: Zeuster and Archimoodes have asked that you take the young apprentice magepriests on a field trip to meet their relatives, the cattle of Jeryon.  Be careful, apprentices are known for mischief.

properties.name: Don't have a Kow
properties.description: Zeuster and Archimoodes have asked that you take the young apprentice magepriests on a field trip to meet their relatives, the cattle of Jeryon.  Be careful, apprentices are known for mischief.
properties.complete: You found all the scattered chickcalves AND managed to not get skewered on a set of the Jer'yon kow's horns.  I'd call this trip a success.
